column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/a034c7ebb6995c342fea289d04a6198d793eab08 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu

This should fix problems some people with mingw-64 compilers have.

util.h:211:57: error: 'pid_t' has not been declared
